overview: Jeetendra is the owner of a semi big mansion. But which is not in a good condition. Jeevan is after this mansion, but Jeetendra is not wanting to sell. Jeetendra is a drunkard and one day falls in love with Rajshree. She then takes it upon herself to make Jeetendra a better person and rid him of his drinking obsession.
title: Gunahon Ka Devta
